code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FirstSecond(){const[order,setOrder]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const saved=localStorage.getItem("firstsecond");if(saved){const{order}=JSON.parse(saved);setOrder(order);}});const decideOrder=()=>{const randomZeroOne=Math.floor(Math.random()*2);var result=randomZeroOne===1?"先攻":"後攻";setOrder(result);localStorage.setItem("firstsecond",JSON.stringify({order:result}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex  align-items-center justify-content-center m-5 flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u5148\u540E\u653B"}),order&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"display-1 mt-5 mb-5",style:{backgroundColor:order==="先攻"?"red":"blue",color:"white",padding:"20px",borderRadius:"10px"},children:order}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary btn-lg col-3",onClick:decideOrder,children:"\u51B3\u5B9A"})]})});}export default FirstSecond;
